original_text: There were also another 24 oxen, 60 male sheep, 60 male goats and 60 male lambs. The male lambs were one year old. Those animals were for the friendship offering. That was the offering when they made the altar special for God. That was after Moses had poured special oil on it.
korean_text: 화목제물로 수소가 스물네 마리요 숫양이 육십 마리요 숫염소가 육십 마리요 일 년 된 어린 숫양이 육십 마리라 이는 제단에 기름 바른 후에 드린 바 제단의 봉헌물이었더라

sentences.original_text: The male lambs were one year old
Those animals were for the friendship offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그 동물들은 교제 제물을 위한 것이었습니다

sentences.original_text: when they made the altar special for God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 제단을 하나님께 거룩하게 만들 때의

sentences.original_text: That was after Moses had poured special oil on it
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 모세가 제단에 특별한 기름을 부은 후였습니다
